infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Retao uses your location to show nearby items available for borrowing and to improve listing relevance based on your area.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Retao uses your camera to let you take photos of items you want to list for borrowing.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Retao accesses your photo library so you can upload photos of items for your listings.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Retao uses your calendar to let you schedule item availability and reminders.

plugins.calendarPermission: Retao uses your calendar to let you schedule item availability and reminders.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Retao uses your location to show nearby items available for borrowing and to improve listing relevance based on your area.

plugins.photosPermission: Retao accesses your photo library so you can upload photos of items for your listings.
